tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE training_history (
    model_id INT,
    training_date DATE,
    training_loss DECIMAL(10,2),
    validation_loss DECIMAL(10,2),
    training_accuracy DECIMAL(5,2)
);

CREATE TABLE training_history (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    model_id INT,
    epoch_count INT,
    loss FLOAT,
    accuracy FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE training_history (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    model_id INT,
    epoch INT,
    loss FLOAT,
    accuracy FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE model_progress (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    model_id INT,
    epoch INT,
    training_loss FLOAT,
    validation_loss FLOAT,
    training_accuracy FLOAT,
    validation_accuracy FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE model_config (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    model_name VARCHAR(255),
    learning_rate FLOAT,
    batch_size INT,
    num_layers INT,
    optimizer VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE training_history (
    training_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    model_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    epoch INT NOT NULL,
    loss FLOAT NOT NULL,
    accuracy FLOAT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE model_progress (
    progress_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    model_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    epoch INT NOT NULL,
    current_lr FLOAT NOT NULL,
    optimizer VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE training_metrics (
    metric_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    training_id INT NOT NULL,
    loss FLOAT NOT NULL,
    accuracy FLOAT NOT NULL,
    validation_loss FLOAT NOT NULL,
    validation_accuracy FLOAT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE model_parameters (
    parameter_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    model_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    parameter_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    parameter_value FLOAT NOT NULL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE training_records (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    model_id INT,
    training_date DATE,
    training_loss FLOAT,
    training_accuracy FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE model_details (
    model_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    model_name VARCHAR(50),
    architecture TEXT,
    hyperparameters JSON,
    training_status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE validation_history (
    validation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    record_id INT,
    validation_date DATE,
    validation_loss FLOAT,
    validation_accuracy FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE model_performance (
    performance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    model_id INT,
    validation_id INT,
    performance_metric VARCHAR(50),
    metric_value FLOAT
);
